name: Crime Scene Processing
description: Techniques for properly securing, documenting, and analyzing crime scenes.

cards.title: Scene Preservation & Contamination Control
cards.description: Ensuring a crime scene remains uncontaminated and all evidence is preserved.
bulletpoints: Establish and secure crime scene perimeters
Use proper PPE and contamination control procedures
Document scene layout, environmental factors, and evidence placement

cards.title: Evidence Tagging and Documentation
cards.description: Properly labeling, collecting, and logging evidence for forensic analysis.
bulletpoints: Use chain of custody protocols for legal integrity
Tag evidence using barcode systems and logs
Take high-quality photos and sketches of all critical elements
